## Pléiades (Très Haute Résolution) 🛰️

::: {.notes}

- 4 [**characteristics**]{.orange} to look at:
  - [**Spatial resolution**]{.blue2} 📐
  - [**Acquisition frequency**]{.blue2} 🔄
  - [**Spectral resolution**]{.blue2} 🌈
  - [**Geographic coverage**]{.blue2} 🌍
:::


- [**Caractéristiques**]{.orange}:
  - Résolution spatial : [**0.5m × 0.5m**]{.blue2} 🔍
  - [**3**]{.blue2} bandes spectrales ([**R**]{.red2}[**G**]{.green2}[**B**]{.blue2}) 🎨
  - [**Archives**]{.blue2} gratuites, acquisition [**sur-demande**]{.blue2} ([**6-8 mois**]{.green2} par département), Airbus © licence 📅
  - Taille d'image: [**1 km²**]{.blue2} (2000 × 2000 pixels) 🖼️
